job_details.full_text:
Senior DevOps Engineer - Microsoft 365 Specialist

dynamic team. You will work closely with business analysts, implementation specialists, a product owner, solution architect, and -of course- other DevOps engineers to unlock the full potential of Microsoft 365. Key Responsibilities · Help the DevOps engineering team grow through your experience and insights.· Lay the foundation for a codebase that scales to 100 solutions whilst remaining maintainable and productive for the team· Initiate quality-related improvements, propose and convince the team and business to invest in these areas· Oversee the entire application lifecycle of all building blocks (eg SPFX solutions and Azure Functions).· Explore new possibilities such as adaptive cards and generative AI.· Foster a constructive and responsible mindset within the development team.· Collaborate closely with the team rather than working in isolation. What we offer · A competitive salary based on your qualities and experience.· Access to Udemy, Cognizant Academy digital libraries for your

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on Microsoft 365, DevOps, and traditional software lifecycle management. While it mentions exploring generative AI, this is a minor aspect and not the core focus of the role. The primary responsibilities align with traditional DevOps and software engineering rather than specialized AI engineering.

phrases: Lay the foundation for a codebase that scales to 100 solutions whilst remaining maintainable and productive for the team
Oversee the entire application lifecycle of all building blocks (eg SPFX solutions and Azure Functions)
job_tasks.justification: These phrases describe managing the lifecycle of software components and ensuring code maintainability and scalability, which are core software development activities.

phrases: Help the DevOps engineering team grow through your experience and insights
Initiate quality-related improvements, propose and convince the team and business to invest in these areas
job_tasks.justification: The title explicitly states 'DevOps Engineer', and the responsibilities involve team growth, quality improvements, and overseeing the application lifecycle, all of which fall under operations engineering.

phrases: You will work closely with business analysts, implementation specialists, a product owner, solution architect
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates collaboration with business-focused roles to understand requirements and align technical work with business needs.

phrases: Explore new possibilities such as adaptive cards and generative AI
job_tasks.justification: This phrase mentions exploring generative AI, which is a form of modeling, although it's presented as an exploration rather than a core responsibility.
